findings.description: Total plan count arithmetic does not add up. STATE.md claims 70 total plans, but per-milestone breakdown sums to 67: v1.0 (9) + v1.1 (17) + v1.2 (20) + v1.3 (21) = 67. The discrepancy of 3 plans is unexplained. ROADMAP.md lists only 20 plans for v1.3 (7+2+5+6), while STATE.md and the v1.3 audit claim 21 (adding '+1 integration'). Even with 21, the total is 67, not 70.
findings.actual: 67 plans by per-milestone addition (or 66 if ROADMAP's 20 for v1.3 is correct)
findings.fix: Reconcile: either the total should be 67 (or 66), or one of the per-milestone plan counts is wrong. Also update MEMORY.md which claims 70.

findings.description: v1.3 plan count: ROADMAP.md lists exactly 20 plans (7+2+5+6) across 4 phases, but STATE.md says '21 plans' and v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT.md says '21 (7 + 2 + 5 + 6 + 1 integration)'. The '+1 integration' plan does not appear in ROADMAP.md's plan listing. Either the extra plan should be documented in ROADMAP.md, or the count should be 20.
findings.value_a: 20 plans listed (7 for Phase 15, 2 for Phase 16, 5 for Phase 17, 6 for Phase 18)
findings.actual: 20 plan files exist per ROADMAP; the extra is an unclarified 'integration' step
findings.fix: Either add the integration plan to ROADMAP.md or correct STATE.md and the audit to 20 plans

findings.description: ROADMAP.md shows v1.3 as 'in progress' but v1.3 is COMPLETE per STATE.md (2026-02-14). The milestones header at line 8 says '**v1.3 Production Launch** - Phases 15-18 (in progress)' -- this should say 'COMPLETE' or similar.
findings.value_b: v1.3 Production Launch -- COMPLETE (all 4 phases, 18/18 total phases done)
findings.actual: v1.3 is COMPLETE as of 2026-02-14
findings.fix: Update ROADMAP.md milestone header to show v1.3 as COMPLETE with date

findings.description: PROJECT.md still uses active/current framing for v1.3 milestone: 'Current Milestone: v1.3 Production Launch' (line 70) and 'Current milestone: v1.3 Production Launch -- data hardening, website deployment...' (line 195). v1.3 is COMPLETE per STATE.md. PROJECT.md should reflect completion status.
findings.value_a: Current Milestone: v1.3 Production Launch (active framing)
findings.actual: v1.3 completed 2026-02-14
findings.fix: Change PROJECT.md to past tense, add v1.3 to the 'Validated' requirements list, update current state to reflect completion

findings.description: PROJECT.md 'Out of Scope' section still lists 'Scraper pagination fixes -- v1.3 candidate' and 'Congress.gov bill detail fetching -- v1.3 candidate' (lines 91-92). Both were delivered in Phase 15 (INTEL-01 for bill detail fetching, INTEL-02 for scraper pagination). These items should be removed from Out of Scope and credited to v1.3.
findings.value_a: Scraper pagination fixes -- v1.3 candidate; Congress.gov bill detail fetching -- v1.3 candidate
findings.value_b: Both delivered and marked Complete in v1.3 Phase 15
findings.actual: Both features shipped in v1.3
findings.fix: Remove both items from Out of Scope, add them to the Validated requirements list under v1.3

findings.description: MILESTONES.md has NO v1.3 entry. The file stops at v1.2. v1.3 completed with 4 phases, 21 plans, 39 requirements, 964 tests -- this entire milestone is undocumented in the milestones archive file.
findings.value_a: Only v1.0, v1.1, v1.2 entries exist
findings.value_b: v1.3 complete 2026-02-14 (4 phases, 21 plans, 39 requirements, 964 tests)
findings.actual: v1.3 is complete but not recorded in MILESTONES.md
findings.fix: Add v1.3 entry to MILESTONES.md with key accomplishments, stats, and git range

findings.description: Source file count: PROJECT.md says '95 source files' (line 103), STATE.md says '98 Python files' (line 44), v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT says '98 Python' (line 191). Ground truth from filesystem: 54 src + 33 tests + 14 scripts + 1 root = 102 active Python files. None of the documents match the actual count.
findings.actual: 102 active Python files (54 src + 33 tests + 14 scripts + 1 root) per ground truth
findings.fix: Update all documents to consistent count. Decide whether 'source files' means src/ only (54) or all active Python (102), and use that count consistently.

findings.description: LOC figures: PROJECT.md, STATE.md, MILESTONES.md, V1.3-OPERATIONS-PLAN.md, and v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT.md all say '~37,900 LOC Python'. Ground truth: src+tests = 38,340 LOC. The tilde approximation is close but consistently cited as an exact figure from v1.2 that was never updated for v1.3 code additions (Phase 15-18 added new files).
findings.actual: 38,340 LOC (src+tests)
findings.fix: Update to ~38,300 or the accurate count with qualifier (e.g., 'src+tests'). Clarify what is counted -- src only (18,524), src+tests (38,340), or all Python (46,543).

findings.description: Test count: PROJECT.md says '743 tests' (line 129) which is the v1.2 figure. STATE.md correctly says '964 tests'. The test suite grew from 743 to 964 during v1.3 but PROJECT.md was never updated.
findings.actual: 964 tests per ground truth (pytest collected)
findings.fix: Update PROJECT.md test count to 964

findings.description: Document count: All documents claim 992 (384 Doc A + 592 Doc B + 8 Doc C + 8 Doc D). Ground truth shows 996 DOCX files on the filesystem. The 4-file discrepancy is unaccounted for.
findings.actual: 996 DOCX files in outputs/packets/
findings.fix: Investigate 4 extra DOCX files (possibly strategic overview, or regenerated files). Update document count to 996 if they are valid production documents, or document the discrepancy.

findings.description: v1.3 decision count: v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT.md says '33 (DEC-1501-01 through DEC-1806-01)'. Actual count of unique DEC-15xx through DEC-18xx in STATE.md is 36. The audit undercounts by 3.
findings.actual: 36 decisions
findings.fix: Update v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT.md decision count to 36

findings.description: PROJECT.md 'Last updated' timestamp says '2026-02-12 after v1.3 milestone initialization'. v1.3 completed on 2026-02-14 but PROJECT.md was not updated afterward. The timestamp is stale.
findings.value_a: Last updated: 2026-02-12 after v1.3 milestone initialization
findings.value_b: Last updated: 2026-02-14 after Phase 18 completion (GO confirmed)
findings.actual: PROJECT.md is stale; last meaningful project update was 2026-02-14
findings.fix: Update PROJECT.md timestamp and content to reflect v1.3 completion

findings.description: PROJECT.md 'Target features' section (lines 75-80) describes v1.3 features in future tense ('Data reliability: scraper pagination fixes...'). These features are now delivered. The section reads as forward-looking when everything listed has shipped.
findings.value_b: All target features delivered in v1.3 Phases 15-18
findings.actual: All features shipped
findings.fix: Rewrite in past tense or move to Validated requirements

findings.description: AWRD-01 in v1.2-REQUIREMENTS.md says '11 program queries' but the actual implementation uses 14 CFDAs x 5 FYs = 70 queries. The v1.2-ROADMAP.md and audit correctly say 14 CFDAs. The archived requirement text was never corrected.
findings.value_a: Batch USASpending queries by CFDA number (11 program queries, not 592 Tribe queries)
findings.actual: 14 CFDAs (not 11), 70 total queries
findings.fix: This is an archived file so low urgency, but the AWRD-01 text should note the discrepancy or be corrected

findings.description: V1.3-OPERATIONS-PLAN.md uses 'Phase 1/2/3' numbering for its 3-phase structure (DOCX Visual QA, Website Launch, Production Hardening), while ROADMAP.md uses 'Phase 15/16/17/18' for the 4-phase actual execution. The operations plan also has no Phase equivalent to Phase 15 (Congressional Intelligence) which was planned separately via TRIGGER-PROMPT-V1.3.md. The ops plan is a pre-execution planning doc and is now superseded but could confuse readers.
findings.value_a: Phase 1 (DOCX QA), Phase 2 (Website), Phase 3 (Hardening) -- 3 phases, numbered 1-3
findings.value_b: Phase 15 (Congressional), Phase 16 (Doc Quality), Phase 17 (Website), Phase 18 (Hardening) -- 4 phases
findings.actual: The operations plan was a pre-execution draft; actual execution added Congressional Intelligence as Phase 15 and renumbered
findings.fix: Add a note to V1.3-OPERATIONS-PLAN.md header marking it as superseded by ROADMAP.md, or archive it

findings.description: ROADMAP-SUPPLEMENTAL-UPDATES.md references INTG-07 and INTG-08 requirements that do not exist in the archived v1.2-REQUIREMENTS.md (which stops at INTG-06, totaling 24 requirements). The supplemental also claims 'Mapped: 27/27' while the actual v1.2 coverage is 24/24. This appears to be a working draft that was superseded by the final v1.2 requirements but never updated or archived.
findings.actual: v1.2 has 24 requirements; INTG-07 and INTG-08 never materialized as separate requirements (content was absorbed into INTG-01 through INTG-06)
findings.fix: Archive or remove ROADMAP-SUPPLEMENTAL-UPDATES.md as superseded, or add a header noting it is stale

findings.description: CLAUDE.md (project root) says 'tests/ - 287 tests (pytest)' which is the v1.1 count. Actual count is 964.
findings.actual: 964 tests
findings.fix: Update CLAUDE.md test count to 964

findings.description: PROJECT.md 'Known tech debt' section (lines 131-136) lists 8 items and 0 critical. These are v1.2 tech debt items. v1.3 accumulated 48 items (0 P0, 3 P1 deferred, 16 P2, 29 P3) per v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT. PROJECT.md tech debt section is stale.
findings.value_b: 48 total tech debt items (0 P0, 3 P1, 16 P2, 29 P3)
findings.actual: 48 accumulated tech debt items across v1.2 and v1.3
findings.fix: Update PROJECT.md tech debt section to reflect v1.3 final state

findings.description: ROADMAP.md Phase 15/16/17 completion dates all show '2026-02-12' (line 211-213). Phase 18 shows '2026-02-14'. STATE.md confirms v1.3 last activity was 2026-02-14. The 2026-02-12 date for Phases 15-17 may be correct (they completed before Phase 18), but it is worth verifying that Phase 17 actually completed on 2026-02-12 and not later.
findings.value_b: v1.3 complete 2026-02-14 (does not break down per-phase dates)
findings.actual: Phase completion dates should be verified; 3 phases on same day seems plausible given project velocity but warrants confirmation
findings.fix: Verify Phase 15/16/17 completion dates from commit history; correct if any are wrong

findings.description: Phase 15 naming varies: ROADMAP.md section header says 'Congressional Intelligence Pipeline' (line 50), progress table says 'Congressional Intelligence' (line 211), STATE.md says 'Congressional intelligence + data reliability' (line 63). Three different names for the same phase.
findings.actual: All refer to the same Phase 15
findings.fix: Pick one canonical name and use it consistently. Suggest 'Congressional Intelligence Pipeline' as the header uses it

findings.description: Document type naming transition incomplete. PROJECT.md validated requirements (lines 39-40) still use 'Document 1' and 'Document 2' from v1.1 era, while all v1.2/v1.3 documents use 'Doc A/B/C/D'. The key decisions table (line 170) also still says 'Document 1 (per-Tribe) and Document 2 (strategic overview)'. The old naming coexists with the new.
findings.value_a: 'Document 1: per-Tribe DOCX' and 'Document 2: shared strategic overview'
findings.value_b: 'Doc A (Tribal internal), Doc B (congressional), Doc C (regional internal), Doc D (regional congressional)'
findings.actual: Doc A/B/C/D is the current naming convention; Document 1/2 is legacy from v1.1
findings.fix: Add a note in the v1.1 era requirements that Document 1 = Doc A/B, Document 2 = strategic overview. Or update to current naming.

findings.description: v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT.md has no git range. All other milestone audits include 'Git range: <start> -> <end>'. The v1.3 end commit is e8a4aba per ground truth, and the start should be 8f96850 (v1.2 end).
findings.file_b: MILESTONES.md pattern (v1.0, v1.1, v1.2 all have git ranges)
findings.actual: Git range: 8f96850 -> e8a4aba
findings.fix: Add git range to v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT.md

findings.description: PROJECT.md 'Active' requirements section (line 66-68) says 'See .planning/REQUIREMENTS.md for v1.3 Production Launch requirements.' This framing implies v1.3 is active, but v1.3 is complete. The Active section should be empty or point to a future milestone.
findings.value_a: Active: See .planning/REQUIREMENTS.md for v1.3 Production Launch requirements.
findings.actual: No active requirements exist; v1.3 is done
findings.fix: Clear the Active section or update to say 'None -- v1.3 complete, no active milestone'

findings.description: MILESTONES.md ordering is non-chronological. The file lists v1.2 first (lines 3-29), then v1.0 (lines 33-58), then v1.1 (lines 62-90). Convention in all other docs is chronological order. This is confusing.
findings.value_a: Order: v1.2 -> v1.0 -> v1.1 (most recent first but v1.0 and v1.1 reversed)
findings.value_b: Should be chronological (v1.0 -> v1.1 -> v1.2) or reverse chronological (v1.2 -> v1.1 -> v1.0)
findings.actual: Current order is inconsistent: newest first but v1.0 and v1.1 are swapped
findings.fix: Reorder to either chronological or consistent reverse-chronological

findings.description: V1.3-OPERATIONS-PLAN.md references 'React 18 + Vite 6 + Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn/ui' as the website stack (from REQUIREMENTS.md WEB section, line 81). The actual deployed website uses vanilla HTML/JS/CSS + Fuse.js, not React. The operations plan's Phase 2 sessions reference React components (TribeSelector.tsx, RegionSelector.tsx) and npm commands that were never used.
findings.value_a: React 18 + Vite 6 + Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn/ui
findings.actual: The website was rebuilt from scratch as vanilla HTML/JS during execution, not using the planned React stack
findings.fix: The ops plan is a pre-execution document but could note that the React stack was replaced. REQUIREMENTS.md WEB section line 81 still references the old React stack and should be corrected.

findings.description: Phase 15 requirement count: STATE.md Phase Structure table says '15 INTEL + 3 XCUT' = 18 requirements for Phase 15 alone. But ROADMAP.md Phase 15 lists: INTEL-01 through INTEL-15 (15) + XCUT-01 through XCUT-03 (3) = 18. MEMORY.md says 'Phase 15: Congressional Intelligence DONE (7 plans, 18 requirements, 951 tests)'. All consistent at 18. However, this means v1.3 total should be 18+6+10+5=39. STATE.md says 39. This one checks out.
findings.actual: 18 requirements for Phase 15 -- CONSISTENT (included as verification note, not a finding)
findings.fix: No fix needed -- this cross-reference resolves correctly

findings.description: V1.3-OPERATIONS-PLAN.md bug hunt output says 'GAUNTLET.md' but actual output was named 'SYNTHESIS.md' in outputs/bug_hunt/. STATE.md references SYNTHESIS.md for both Phase 16 and Phase 18 outputs.
findings.actual: GAUNTLET.md was renamed to SYNTHESIS.md during execution
findings.fix: Low priority -- ops plan is superseded. Could add a note if the file is retained.

findings.description: Ground truth notes 'congressional_cache.json exists (not congressional_intel.json as some docs reference)'. The data file is named congressional_cache.json in the filesystem, but REQUIREMENTS.md INTEL-03 and INTEL-10 reference 'congressional_intel.json', and MEMORY.md references 'congressional_intel.json'. The actual build script is build_congressional_intel.py but its output is congressional_cache.json.
findings.actual: File is congressional_cache.json on disk
findings.fix: Update REQUIREMENTS.md references to congressional_cache.json, or verify if both files exist at different stages

findings.description: ROADMAP.md uses 'Congressional Intelligence Pipeline' as Phase 15 section heading but the progress table shortens it to 'Congressional Intelligence'. STATE.md Phase Structure table says 'Congressional intelligence + data reliability'. The phase name should be consistent throughout.
findings.actual: Three different names for Phase 15
findings.fix: Standardize to one name

findings.description: DOCX-01 success criteria text mentions the structural validator should run 'in under 60 seconds' (ROADMAP.md line 112), but DEC-1601-01 relaxed the performance budget to 210 seconds due to python-docx parsing overhead. The ROADMAP success criteria text was not updated to reflect this decision.
findings.actual: Actual runtime ~208s at ~208ms/doc
findings.fix: Update ROADMAP.md success criteria to reflect the 210s budget or note the decision override

findings.description: ROADMAP.md references agent prompt files (e.g., sovereignty-scout.md, fire-keeper.md, cyclops.md, etc.) which should exist in .planning/. Not all of these were verified to exist on disk, though they are referenced in multiple places and appear to be part of the planning infrastructure.
findings.value_a: References to 13+ agent prompt files in .planning/
findings.actual: Agent files should be verified; TRIGGER-PROMPT-V1.3.md confirmed to exist
findings.fix: Low priority -- verify all referenced agent files exist

findings.description: MILESTONES.md v1.2 entry ends with 'What's next: Planning v1.3 (congressional alerts, confidence scoring, scraper pagination)' -- this was accurate at time of archiving but v1.3 is now complete. The entry is an archive and should remain unchanged, but readers may be confused without a v1.3 entry following it.
findings.actual: v1.3 is complete; the missing v1.3 entry is the real fix (see MJ-006)
findings.fix: Adding the v1.3 entry (MJ-006) resolves this naturally

findings.description: MILESTONES.md v1.2 stats section says '95 Python source files' (line 20). At the time of v1.2 shipping, this may have been accurate (pre-v1.3 additions). However, the V1.3-OPERATIONS-PLAN.md also says '95 files' in its header context line. The ops plan was created at v1.2 completion, so '95' was correct at that time. Phase 18 RESEARCH.md says '96 Python source files'. This drifted during v1.3 execution without consistent updates.
findings.actual: Final count: 102 active per ground truth; various snapshots in time are all stale
findings.fix: These are point-in-time snapshots that are acceptable in archived docs; the main issue is the current-state docs (PROJECT.md, STATE.md) which are covered by MJ-007

findings.description: v1.2 decisions are documented in v1.2-ROADMAP.md (20+ DEC-xxxx entries) and v1.2-MILESTONE-AUDIT.md references '30 decisions recorded'. These are NOT listed in STATE.md's Decisions table, which only contains v1.3 decisions (DEC-1501-01 through DEC-1806-01). Pre-v1.3 decisions are only in the archived milestone docs.
findings.value_a: Only v1.3 decisions (36 entries, DEC-1501-01 through DEC-1806-01)
findings.actual: STATE.md only tracks current-milestone decisions; historical decisions in archives
findings.fix: Acceptable pattern if by design. Consider adding a note in STATE.md: 'For v1.0-v1.2 decisions, see milestone archives.'

findings.description: WEB requirement IDs overlap between v1.1 and v1.3. v1.1-REQUIREMENTS.md has WEB-01/02/03 (GitHub Pages widget, Actions workflow, SquareSpace embed). v1.3 REQUIREMENTS.md has WEB-01 through WEB-10 (completely different requirements about DOCX downloads, 592-Tribe coverage, etc.). The namespace collision means 'WEB-01' refers to different things depending on which milestone you are reading.
findings.actual: Same ID, different requirements across milestones
findings.fix: Low priority for archived docs, but note the collision for any future requirement ID scheme

findings.description: Milestone v1.1 ROADMAP shows Phase 8 has 6 plans but the v1.1-REQUIREMENTS.md lists 8 requirements for Phase 8 (DOC-05, DOC-06, OPS-01, OPS-02, OPS-03, WEB-01, WEB-02, WEB-03). The v1.1-MILESTONE-AUDIT shows 17 total plans matching the ROADMAP. The plan-to-requirement mapping is many-to-many, so 6 plans covering 8 requirements is fine structurally, but the v1.1 audit says 'Phase 8 tests: 73' and 'summaries serve as equivalent' for verification, which was flagged as tech debt. This is acceptable but worth noting.
findings.actual: 6 plans, 8 requirements -- many-to-many mapping is valid
findings.fix: No fix needed -- included as verification note

findings.description: REQUIREMENTS.md WEB section (line 81) references 'Stack: React 18 + Vite 6 + Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn/ui' as the website stack. The actual deployed website uses vanilla HTML/JS/CSS + Fuse.js. This stack reference was from the pre-execution plan and should have been updated when the implementation pivoted.
findings.value_a: Stack: React 18 + Vite 6 + Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn/ui
findings.actual: Vanilla HTML/JS/CSS + Fuse.js is the deployed stack
findings.fix: Update REQUIREMENTS.md WEB section to reflect actual stack

findings.description: Milestone date formats vary slightly. MILESTONES.md uses 'Shipped: 2026-02-11' in headers. STATE.md uses '2026-02-11' in table cells. v1.3 uses 'COMPLETE' instead of 'SHIPPED' in STATE.md. The v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT says 'TECH DEBT' status (not 'PASSED' or 'COMPLETE'). Terminology for milestone completion status varies: SHIPPED vs COMPLETE vs TECH DEBT vs PASSED.
findings.actual: v1.3 is complete with deferred tech debt
findings.fix: Minor -- standardize terminology. 'TECH DEBT' means 'complete with accumulated tech debt', same as v1.1 audit. Consider using 'SHIPPED' consistently.

summary.executive_summary: The cross-document corpus has 38 consistency issues. The 12 P1 findings center on stale PROJECT.md content (still shows v1.2 numbers and active v1.3 framing), the missing v1.3 MILESTONES.md entry, arithmetic mismatches in total plan count (claimed 70, actual 66-67), source file count (95 vs 98 vs 102 actual), LOC figures frozen at v1.2 snapshot, test count in PROJECT.md stuck at 743 (actual 964), document count claiming 992 vs filesystem 996, stale 'Out of Scope' items that were delivered, and a decision count error in the v1.3 audit. The 14 P2 findings cover naming inconsistencies (Document 1/2 vs Doc A/B/C/D), orphaned content (ROADMAP-SUPPLEMENTAL-UPDATES.md), the CLAUDE.md stale test count, stale tech debt inventory in PROJECT.md, the React stack reference that was never updated, and cross-reference gaps. The 12 P3 findings are naming nits and style inconsistencies. STATE.md is the most accurate document. PROJECT.md is the most stale, still reflecting v1.2 completion state in most metrics.
verification_notes: Ship dates consistent: v1.0=2026-02-09, v1.1=2026-02-10, v1.2=2026-02-11 -- verified across all docs
v1.3 completion date 2026-02-14 -- consistent between STATE.md and v1.3-MILESTONE-AUDIT.md
Git commit ranges consistent: v1.0 ends 8491e66, v1.1 ends bcd6635, v1.2 ends 8f96850 -- verified across MILESTONES.md and all audit files
Requirement totals per milestone: v1.0=30, v1.1=22, v1.2=24, v1.3=39 (total 115) -- consistent across all docs
Test counts per milestone: v1.0=52, v1.1=287, v1.2=743, v1.3=964 -- consistent across STATE.md and audit files
ROADMAP.md coverage section correctly maps 39/39 v1.3 requirements to phases
All 39 v1.3 requirement IDs in REQUIREMENTS.md match ROADMAP.md coverage listing
All DEC-xxxx IDs in STATE.md reference valid plan numbers (e.g., DEC-1503-01 references plan 15-03)
